          <title>
            <string language="es">El Silicio</string>
            <string language="en">Silicon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Silikon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Silicium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Silicone</string>

          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir por qué no se basa la vida en el Silicio.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must discover why life is not based on silicon.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">biosfera</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, warum das Leben nicht auf Silikon basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir pourquoi la vie n'est pas basée sur le silicium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve descobrir porque
a vida não é baseada no silicone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire perchè la
vita non è basata su silicone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
γιατί η ζωή δεν είναι βασισμένη στο πυρίτιο.</string>
          </description>
